channel.title: Blogs on packnback
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on packnback

item.title: Work begins
item.description: This is the beginning of a project to design and implement a new backup tool called packnback. It makes sense to explain why we should bother in the first place, and what interesting features a new tool can bring to the table. Ideal features Let’s list features that are important in a backup tool and them to existing tools, this will hopefully give you a good idea of the current backup tool choices you might have as an administrator trying to bullet proof a production environment.
